page.topic: Using Xbasic to Select a Record and Display a Form

section.description: Button1 runs Xbasic code that loads the Invoice form to display the details of the invoice selected in the embedded browse.

section.title: Xbasic Code Run by the Button1 OnPushEvent
section.example: DIM zoom as P zoom = :Form.load("Invoice", "", "InvoiceZoom") zoom:tables:INVOICE_HEADER.filter_expression = "INVOICE_NUMBER = '" + inv_number.TEXT + "' " zoom:tables:INVOICE_HEADER.query() zoom.show() zoom.activate()

section.title: An Explanation of the Code
section.description: The first line creates a pointer variable named zoom.
This line loads the Invoice form and uses the variable zoom to refer to it.

This line sets the filter_expression property of the underlying table. The INVOICE_NUMBER field in the database must match the value of the inv_number field on the form. Although hidden, the inv_number field is an easy way to provide a value for the query to match.
Execute the query records against the underlying table.
